name: air-slash
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.
